cmp: 可 (can/may/able to/certain(ly)/to suit/(particle used for emphasis))
mng: to lean on, to rely upon

exm.mng: to lean on, to rest against, to rely on, support, backing, back of a chair
Heaven Sword and Dragon Sabre, wuxia (武侠, martial arts chivalry) novel by Jin Yong 金庸 and its screen adaptations
to lean on, to rely on
to rely on, to be dependent on
variant of 無依無靠|无依无靠[wu2 yi1 wu2 kao4]
to lean against the railings and look at the moon (idiom)
